description:
18 years old. He worked as part of the DC remnants, and his ranking is Second Lieutenant. He`s calm, and is always thinking clearly. He also acts like a gentleman. His sense of justice is strong, and he dislikes seeing the weak getting bullied, which gets him into several disagreements with his superior, Archibald Grims. He considers Bullet his rival, though he comes to understand him during their many battles with eachother, and he later joins him.
He enjoys astronomy and tea. Though he`s usually quiet, he gets quite talkative once someone brings up those subjects. He has a very specific way he likes his tea, and always drinks it during the same time every day.
He fought against an Aerogators unit that attacked San Diego during the L5 Campaign.
name: Yuuki Jegunan
